attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Linda Gilroy, Labour MP for Plymouth has gained cross-party support for an Early Day Motion, which urges the Treasury and the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs to intervene over SWW's price hikes when the parent company Pennon Group plc is announcing profits of £111 million.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
